item.title: cursor handling and updates inside DRM
item.author: Author
item.description: The current DRM kernel modesetting tree is already taking care to update the cursor registers and paint it to the screen. Very cool [0]. What I’ve done today is a shortcut between the kernel input layer and DRM to update the cursor directly on screen without the X server be notified always. Of course, a lot of issues raised up together. So let’s try to delegates the tasks again. userspace app (X server):
